meanings.sent1: The story was nonbiblical, as it did not appear in the holy book.
meanings.sent2: The nonbiblical tale was entertaining but not part of religious texts.
meanings.sent3: The nonbiblical joke made everyone laugh, even though it wasn't from the Bible.
meanings.sent4: Her nonbiblical explanation shed light on a topic not covered in religious texts.
meanings.sent5: The nonbiblical concept was like a colorful puzzle piece that didn't fit in the Bible.

meanings.definition: Contrary to the teachings of the Bible.
meanings.sent1: His beliefs were nonbiblical, going against what the Bible teaches.
meanings.sent2: The nonbiblical practices of the group were frowned upon by the church.
meanings.sent3: She had a nonbiblical approach to cooking, using ingredients not mentioned in the Bible.
meanings.sent4: Their nonbiblical views on charity clashed with traditional biblical principles.
meanings.sent5: The nonbiblical behavior stood out like a bright light in a dark room of religious conformity.
